author: cnbc.com
title: Accuray: Fiscal 3Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SUNNYVALE, Calif. (AP) _ Accuray Inc. (ARAY) on Monday reported a loss of $8.9 million in its fiscal third quarter.
The Sunnyvale, California-based company said it had a loss of 10 cents per share.
The radiation oncology company posted revenue of $99.8 million in the period.
Accuray expects full-year revenue in the range of $395 million to $400 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Monday, the company's shares hit $5. A year ago, they were trading at $4.55.
